spatial_accuracy.notes: Room placement for Kitchen, Utility, and adjacent toilets is significantly altered. Wall alignment is inconsistent in several areas, particularly around the kitchen/utility corridor and the deck areas (E2). Window placement is missing from several rooms (E1). Room proportions are distorted for the Kitchen, Utility, and parts of the deck areas (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is inconsistent, especially for exterior walls and around the decks (E6). Door embedding is incorrect in several rooms; many doors are missing or replaced by open archways (E1, E2). Adjacency relationships are compromised due to changes in room layout (E2). No missing rooms entirely, but significant restructuring (E2). No hallucinated rooms, but significant layout changes (E2).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is inaccurate in almost all rooms, with many items missing or reoriented (E1, E2, E3). Furniture scale appears inconsistent; some items seem oversized for the space (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera correctness is acceptable. Orthographic projection is reasonably accurate. Lighting quality is poor, leading to flat visuals and lack of depth (E6). Geometry shows some distortions, particularly in wall thickness and corner definitions (E6). Visual clarity is moderate, but the overall composition is somewhat bland due to lighting.

detected_errors.description: Room placement for Kitchen, Utility, and adjacent toilets is significantly altered from the floor plan.
Wall alignment is inconsistent in several areas, particularly around the kitchen/utility corridor and the deck areas.
Window placement is missing from several rooms, notably BED-2, TOI-4, and the Kitchen/Utility area.
Room proportions are distorted for the Kitchen, Utility, and parts of the deck areas.
Wall thickness is inconsistent, especially for exterior walls and around the decks.
Many doors are missing or replaced by open archways, e.g., entry to Kitchen, all internal doors to bathrooms and bedrooms.
Adjacency relationships are compromised due to significant changes in room layout, specifically the kitchen/utility/toilet block.
Significant restructuring of the Kitchen, Utility, and toilet areas (adjacent to Foyer).
Furniture is missing from several rooms (e.g., dining chairs in Kitchen, many items in bedrooms).
Furniture placement is inaccurate in almost all rooms.
Furniture orientation is incorrect in several instances (e.g., bed in BED-2, sofa in LIVING/DINING).
Furniture scale appears inconsistent; some items seem oversized for the space (e.g., living room sofa).
Lighting quality is poor, leading to flat visuals and lack of depth.
Geometry shows some distortions, particularly in wall thickness and corner definitions.
